name: Potato Salad
description: A classic American potato salad with hard-boiled eggs, celery, onion, radishes, and mayonnaise.
ingredients: 1 5 lbs bag of Yukon Gold Potato
instructions: boil potatoes until you can stick a fork in them and are soft but not mushy (about 40-45 min)
boil eggs - place them in cold water in a pot and bring to a boil, boil 7-8 min and then remove and run under cold water
cut up the celery, onion and radishes
put everything together and add enough mayo so it is not too sticky anymore.
add salt and pepper until it tasted perfect and sprikle paprika over the top to make it look pretty.
